projects.title: Improve Board Responsiveness and Scrolling
projects.summary: Fix scrolling so all board content is accessible, add ability to create new cards.
projects.details:
**Goal:** Full board usability - scrolling + card creation

**Specific Issues:**
- Cannot scroll to see cards below window frame
- No way to add new project cards from the UI

**Definition of Done:**
1. Elliott can scroll to see ALL cards in every column
2. Elliott can add new project cards directly from the board UI
3. Elliott can manipulate all parts of the board (drag/drop, edit, etc.)

**Status:** Bug found 1/31 - JS was fetching wrong path (dist/dist/). Fixed and deployed.

projects.title: Create a Proactive Employee Workflow
projects.summary: Define and implement a system for Aurora to proactively identify and execute tasks without direct instruction.
projects.details:
**Goal:** Aurora works autonomously, produces completed work overnight.

**Resources Available:**
- TradeStation API: ✅ HAVE IT (not waiting)
- Calendar integration: ✅ Working
- Sub-agent spawning: ✅ Working

**User Stories:**
1. As Aurora, I check the board hourly and schedule work for items
2. As Aurora, I delegate appropriate tasks to sub-agents
3. As Aurora, I produce deliverables without being asked
4. As Elliott, I wake up to completed work

**Definition of Done:**
1. HEARTBEAT.md includes mandatory board review with clear procedure
2. Board items have clear definitions of done
3. Aurora demonstrates autonomous task completion over 3+ days
4. Morning deliverables appear without prompting

projects.title: Design and Implement Layered Memory System
projects.summary: Refactor memory system for better organization, scalability, and context retrieval.
projects.details:
**Goal:** Better memory architecture for continuity across sessions.

**Components:**
- Working memory (ACTIVE-CONTEXT.md)
- Daily logs (memory/YYYY-MM-DD.md)
- Long-term curated (MEMORY.md)
- Relationship history (relationship.md)

**Definition of Done:**
1. Clear documentation of memory architecture
2. Automated cleanup/consolidation process
3. Effective context retrieval across sessions

**Status:** Conceptually designed, needs implementation work. Moving to 'next' since not actively being worked.
